titleStmt.title: A proclamacion, set furth by the Kynges Maiestie, with thassent of his derest vncle, Edward Duke of Somerset, gouernor of his moste royall persone and of his realmes, dominions and subiectes protector, and others of his moste honorable counsaill, for the repressyng of certain seditious and disobedient persones
Proclamations. 1549-05
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Richardi Graftoni Regij impressoris,

notesStmt.note: title as filmed too dark to read.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
